scripts.build: cd src && echo './blogs/how_i_built_pure_html_blog.md' | xargs -I % sh -c 'mkdir -p ../public/$(../bin/parseName.js --path %) &&  ../bin/createHtmlPage.js % ../public' && echo home directory list && ls && cd .. && find . -name '*.html'
scripts.build:diff: ./bin/files.js | xargs -I % sh -c 'mkdir -p public/$(./bin/parseName.js --path %) && ./bin/createHtmlPage.js % public' && echo home directory list && ls && find . -name '*.html'
